languages.text: {n}Что вполне выгодно для леди Гапрак, ведь после катастрофы на Кьяве Гамма ее семья находится в очень уязвимом положении. Особняком стоит семейство Версериан — сфера отчуждения, окутывающая их, хорошо видна.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Что вполне выгодно для леди Гапрак, ведь после катастрофы на Кьява Гамме ее семья находится в очень уязвимом положении. Особняком стоит семейство Версериан — сфера отчуждения, окутывающая их, хорошо видна.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что вполне выгодно для леди Гапрак, ведь после катастрофы на Кьяве Гамма ее семья находится в очень уязвимом положении. Особняком стоит семейство Версериан — сфера отчуждения, окутывающая их, хорошо видна.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, after the disaster on Kiava Gamma her family has been in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians are standing aloof — a strong sense of exclusion encompasses them.{/n}

{n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, after the disaster on Kiava Gamma her family has been in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians are standing aloof — a strong sense of exclusion encompasses them.{/n}

{n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

{n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}どちらにせよレディ・ギャプラックにとっては実に都合がいい――結局、キアファ・ガンマの災難によって、ガンマ家は極めて弱い地位に置かれ続けている。ウェルザリアン家の者は離れて立ち、歓談から外れているのは明白だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}どちらにせよレディ・ギャプラックにとっては実に都合がいい――結局、キアファ・ガンマの災難によって、ガンマ家は極めて弱い地位に置かれ続けている。ウェルザリアン家の者は離れて立ち、歓談から外れているのは明白だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}对贾帕克夫人而言，这算是场及时雨。毕竟，基亚瓦伽马星上的灾难让她的家族处于极其脆弱的境地。韦尔森家族的人则站在圈子外面，被其他家族的成员排斥，这一点显而易见。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}对贾帕克夫人而言，这算是场及时雨。毕竟，基亚瓦伽马星上的灾难让她的家族处于极其脆弱的境地。韦尔森家族的人则站在圈子外面，被其他家族的成员排斥，这一点显而易见。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esto podría ser una gran ventaja para lady Gaprak, cuya familia se encuentra en una posición extremadamente vulnerable tras la debacle de Kiava Gamma. Los Werserian están aparte, visiblemente excluidos por los demás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esto podría ser una gran ventaja para lady Gaprak, cuya familia se encuentra en una posición extremadamente vulnerable tras la debacle de Kiava Gamma. Los Werserian están aparte, visiblemente excluidos por los demás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une occasion rêvée pour dame Gaprak, le désastre de Kiava Gamma ayant mis sa famille dans une situation plus que précaire. Les Werserian, en revanche, se tiennent à l'écart, sans que personne ne fasse le moindre effort pour cacher cette exclusion volontaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une occasion rêvée pour dame Gaprak, le désastre de Kiava Gamma ayant mis sa famille dans une situation plus que précaire. Les Werserian, en revanche, se tiennent à l'écart, sans que personne ne fasse le moindre effort pour cacher cette exclusion volontaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das wiederum wäre für Lady Gaprak klar von Vorteil – die Katastrophe auf Kiava Gamma hat ihre Familie extrem verletzlich und angreifbar gemacht. Die Werserians stehen abseits, es ist spürbar, dass die übrigen sie ausschließen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das wiederum wäre für Lady Gaprak klar von Vorteil – die Katastrophe auf Kiava Gamma hat ihre Familie extrem verletzlich und angreifbar gemacht. Die Werserians stehen abseits, es ist spürbar, dass die übrigen sie ausschließen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu durum, Leydi Gaprak'ın epey işine gelebilir... Sonuçta Kiava Gama'daki felaket sebebiyle ailesi son derece savunmasız bir konuma düşmüştü. Werserian ailesi ise herkesten ayrı duruyor, herkesçe dışlandıkları aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Which could be quite advantageous to Lady Gaprak — after all, the disaster on Kiava Gamma has left her family in an extremely vulnerable position. The Werserians stand apart, their exclusion from the rest palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu durum, Leydi Gaprak'ın epey işine gelebilir... Sonuçta, Kiava Gama'daki felaket sebebiyle ailesi son derece savunmasız bir konuma düşmüştü. Werserian ailesi ise herkesten ayrı duruyor ve herkesin onları dışladığı aşikâr.{/n}
